00020 #include "commandline_parse.h"
00021 
00022 extern bool in_cspcomp_for_failexit;
00023 
00024 void parse_command_line(StateObj* stateObj, SearchMethod& args, int argc, char** argv)
00025 {
00026  for(int i = 1; i < argc; ++i)
00027   {
00028     const string command(argv[i]);
00029     if(command == string("-findallsols"))
00030     { getOptions(stateObj).findAllSolutions(); }
00031     else if(command == string("-findgenerators"))
00032     { getOptions(stateObj).find_generators = true; }
00033     else if(command == string("-crash"))
00034     { debug_crash = true; }
00035     else if(command == string("-quiet"))
00036     { getOptions(stateObj).parser_verbose = false; }
00037 
00038     else if(command == string("-redump"))
00039     { getOptions(stateObj).redump = true; }
00040     else if(command == string("-Xgraph"))
00041     { 
00042       getOptions(stateObj).graph = true;
00043       getOptions(stateObj).silent = true;
00044     }
00045     else if(command == string("-outputType"))
00046     {
00047       ++i;
00048       getOptions(stateObj).outputType = atoi(argv[i]);
00049     }
00050     else if(command == string("-printsols"))
00051     { getOptions(stateObj).print_solution = true; }
00052     else if(command == string("-noprintsols"))
00053     { getOptions(stateObj).print_solution = false; }
00054     else if(command == string("-notimers"))
00055     { getOptions(stateObj).noTimers = true; }
00056     else if(command == string("-printsolsonly"))
00057     { getOptions(stateObj).silent = true; }
00058     else if(command == string("-cspcomp"))
00059     { 
00060       getOptions(stateObj).silent = true;
00061       getOptions(stateObj).cspcomp = true;
00062       in_cspcomp_for_failexit = true;
00063     }
00064     else if(command == string("-verbose"))
00065     { getOptions(stateObj).parser_verbose = true; }
00066     else if(command == string("-X-prop-node"))
00067     {
00068       cout << "# WARNING: -X-prop-node is experimental. Do not use for benchmarking!" << endl;
00069       ++i;
00070       string prop_mode(argv[i]);
00071       args.prop_method = GetPropMethodFromString(prop_mode);
00072       if(args.prop_method == PropLevel_None)
00073         cerr << "Must propagate at each node!" << endl;
00074     }
00075     else if(command == string("-preprocess"))
00076     {
00077       ++i;
00078       string prop_mode(argv[i]);
00079       args.preprocess = GetPropMethodFromString(prop_mode);
00080     }
00081     else if(command == string("-fullprop"))
00082     {
00083 #ifndef NO_DEBUG
00084       getOptions(stateObj).fullpropagate = true; 
00085 #else
00086     FAIL_EXIT("This version of minion was not built to support the '-fullprop' command. Sorry");
00087 #endif
00088     }
00089     else if(command == string("-nocheck"))
00090     {
00091       getOptions(stateObj).nocheck = true; 
00092     }
00093     else if(command == string("-check"))
00094     {
00095       getOptions(stateObj).nocheck = false;
00096     } 
00097     else if(command == string("-dumptree"))
00098     { getOptions(stateObj).dumptree = true; }
00099     else if(command == string("-nodelimit"))
00100     {
00101       ++i;
00102       getOptions(stateObj).nodelimit = atoi(argv[i]);
00103       if(getOptions(stateObj).nodelimit == 0)
00104       {
00105         cout << "Did not understand parameter to nodelimit:" << argv[i] << endl;
00106         exit(1);
00107       }
00108     }
00109     else if(command == string("-sollimit"))
00110     {
00111       ++i;
00112       getOptions(stateObj).sollimit = atoi(argv[i]);
00113       if(getOptions(stateObj).sollimit == 0)
00114       {
00115         cout << "Did not understand the parameter to sollimit:" << argv[i] << endl;
00116           exit(1);
00117       }
00118     }
00119     else if(command == string("-timelimit"))
00120     {
00121       ++i;
00122       getOptions(stateObj).time_limit = atoi(argv[i]);
00123       if(getOptions(stateObj).time_limit == 0)
00124       {
00125         cout << "Did not understand the parameter to timelimit:" << argv[i] << endl;
00126       exit(1);
00127       }
00128     }// TODO : Should remove -varorder for beta orderings.
00129     else if(command == string("-varorder") || command == string("-X-varorder") )
00130     { 
00131         cout << "# -varorder is experimental and slower than minion's standard branching." << endl;
00132         ++i;
00133         
00134         string order(argv[i]);
00135         
00136         if(order == "static")
00137           args.order = ORDER_STATIC;
00138           else if(order == "srf")
00139       args.order = ORDER_SRF;
00140       else if(order == "srf-random")
00141       {
00142         args.order = ORDER_SRF;
00143         getOptions(stateObj).randomise_valvarorder = true;
00144       }  
00145       else if(order == "sdf")
00146         args.order = ORDER_SDF;
00147       else if(order == "sdf-random")
00148       {
00149         args.order = ORDER_SDF;
00150         getOptions(stateObj).randomise_valvarorder = true;
00151       }
00152       else if(order == "ldf")
00153         args.order = ORDER_LDF;
00154       else if(order == "ldf-random")
00155       {
00156         args.order = ORDER_LDF;
00157         getOptions(stateObj).randomise_valvarorder = true;
00158       }
00159       else if(order == "random")
00160         getOptions(stateObj).randomise_valvarorder = true;
00161 #if 0
00162       else if(order == "conflict")
00163         args.order = ORDER_CONFLICT;
00164 #endif
00165       else if(order == "wdeg") {
00166         args.order = ORDER_WDEG;
00167         getOptions(stateObj).wdeg_on = true;
00168       } else if(order == "domoverwdeg") {
00169         args.order = ORDER_DOMOVERWDEG;
00170         getOptions(stateObj).wdeg_on = true;
00171       } 
00172       else
00173       {
00174         cerr << "I do not understand the order:" << order << endl;
00175         exit(1);
00176       }
00177     }
00178     else if(command == string("-randomiseorder"))
00179     {
00180       getOptions(stateObj).randomise_valvarorder = true;
00181     }
00182     else if(command == string("-randomseed"))
00183     {
00184       ++i;
00185       args.random_seed = atoi(argv[i]);
00186     }
00187     else if(command == string("-tableout") || command == string("-tableout0"))
00188     {
00189         getOptions(stateObj).tableout=true;
00190         ++i;
00191         getTableOut().set_filename(argv[i]);
00192     }
00193     else if(command == string("-solsout") || command == string("-solsout0"))
00194     {
00195       getOptions(stateObj).solsoutWrite=true;
00196       ++i;
00197       solsoutFile.open(argv[i], ios::app);
00198       if(!solsoutFile)
00199       {
00200         cerr << "Cannot open '" << argv[i] << "' for writing." << endl;
00201         exit(1);
00202       }
00203     }
00204     else if(command[0] == '-' && command != string("--"))
00205     {
00206       cout << "I don't understand '" << command << "'. Sorry. " << endl;
00207       exit(1);
00208     }
00209     else
00210     { 
00211       if(getOptions(stateObj).instance_name == "")
00212         getOptions(stateObj).instance_name = command;
00213     else
00214     {
00215       cout << "I was confused by '" << command << "'. Sorry." << endl;
00216       cout << "You can only give one instance file." << endl;
00217       exit(1);
00218     }
00219     }
00220   }
00221   // bundle all options together and store
00222   string s=string("");
00223   for(int i = 1; i < argc; ++i)
00224   {
00225       if(i<argc-1)
00226           s=s+argv[i]+",";
00227       else
00228           s=s+argv[i];
00229   }
00230   getTableOut().set("CommandLineArguments", s);
00231 }
